subject: LIVE Box Session
author: Urkel23
full_text:
If there is any interest in this, i will do one.  We are experiencing a blizzard here in NJ, so i trapped in the house.

I have 2 new boxes and wouldn't mind trying them out.  So, post here if want to participate in a session.  If enough people reply, we can go ahead with setting up a time.

-Steve
